legal_basis: s. 15(1)(c) of the Canadian Human Rights Act
s. 44(3) of the Canadian Human Rights Act
procedural_fairness: procedural fairness by allowing written submissions
evidence_assessment: evidence showed that 65 was frequently considered the normal retirement age
decision_outcome: Complaints dismissed; no further proceedings warranted
burden_of_proof: CHRC did not err in fact or law, nor breach procedural fairness standards
